page.title: 16Organisation of the Village
page.content: Every four years an election of councillors takes place.{Tidbury {Green,}Cheswick Green and Hockley Heath have a combined{Parish Council } which deals with local problems.The Borough Council concerns itself with Education, Social Services, Housing, Planning Permission, Applications and Public works including streets, litter, speed restrictions etc: Every householder pays rates to the Council for projects like new schools, roudabouts and roads etc.The amount paid varies from each household,it is based on the rateable value of the property.Heavy lorries travelling through Tidbury Green are the main problem of concern at this time because the present roads are not adequate.
